document_title: What is a thyroid tumor? Signs, causes, complications and diagnosis
subsection_content:
The doctor said that most thyroid nodules/nodules do not cause signs or symptoms, so the signs of thyroid nodules are unclear. But sometimes some large tumors can cause signs of thyroid tumor.
Signs of a thyroid tumor include:
The mass in the anterior neck area is visible.; The tumor presses on the recurrent vocal cords, causing hoarseness; The tumor presses on the trachea or esophagus, causing difficulty breathing or swallowing; Hyperthyroidism with symptoms: unexplained weight loss, increased sweating, tremors, anxiety, fast or irregular heartbeat, menstrual irregularities or amenorrhea, diarrhea and more frequent urination, increased appetite taste.; Hypothyroidism with symptoms: Fatigue, numbness and tingling in the hands, weight gain, dry, rough skin and hair, constipation, depression, heavy and frequent menstruation.
